entries.s_fb52d10a: I wish you the best of luck.
entries.s_f7d18c26: Did you say you knew where your family was taken?
entries.s_f4d0be1e: Sorry, I can't talk right now.
entries.s_f4a9d6e8: Do you know where your family was taken?
entries.s_f26c1a9: Don't you think I know that? My family has been kidnapped! The only two things in my life that I hold dear! Of course it's terrible!
entries.s_da11deae: Hello! I wanted to thank you again for helping to rescue my family. We are all deeply indebted to you.
entries.s_d5adc7c6: Actually, I'd rather go rescue your family for you.
entries.s_cf9c96f0: What can I do to help?
entries.s_cdbae137: Sorry, I can't help right now.
entries.s_cadf41fb: I guess I'll have to go myself then. Wish me luck.
entries.s_c6144200: Do you know who took your family?
entries.s_c5196416: I don't think I can help right now, sorry.
entries.s_c4fbf8c5: Calm down. Do you know where your family was taken?
entries.s_c1d778b6: I will give you the ransom money.
entries.s_bed5a497: The note says that I need to pay ten thousand credits. But I barely break even as a moisture farmer. I don't have that kind of money!
entries.s_b7068b53: Calm down. Do you know who took your family?
entries.s_b394e1eb: No, I don't. There were lots of tracks leading away from our house heading this way though. I think there might be a cave or something in this direction. They might be holed up in there.
entries.s_ab3e1351: Yes, hello. You are going to go rescue my wife and daughter are you not?
entries.s_a6faa65a: How much did you say the ransom was?
entries.s_9ead1175: Oh well. Thanks anyway for offering. I guess there's nothing left for me to do but go and try to rescue my wife and daughter myself.
entries.s_916b0cc0: Sure. Here is the location of the cave where I think the brutes might be hiding. Now please save my family, and do be careful.
entries.s_91139d19: It's my wife and daughter, they're gone! I was out checking the moisture crop and when I got back to the house I found a note saying they'd been kidnapped! They're being held for ransom!
entries.s_8e117483: You're right. I'm sorry, but of course you realize why I'm upset.
entries.s_8c9c92a: Alright. Good luck and be safe.
entries.s_7f1f06ba: Oh, hello. Yes, I did have a problem, but a very kind soul has already offered to help. Thank you very much, though.
entries.s_7d7b9050: I'm a moisture farmer. And not even a very good one. I can't help but think that if I was at home instead of checking the evaporators, this never would have happened.
entries.s_7c31a6a3: Can you show me where you think the cave is again?
entries.s_5a04437: Well, I don't have the money to pay the ransom, and if I don't pay, they said they would sell my wife and daughter into slavery. So I'm on my way to try and rescue them myself, although I don't think that I'll be able to put up a good fight.
entries.s_545b2c24: Really? I would be forever grateful, but that's a lot of money. Are you sure?
entries.s_53fb3746: Don't yell at me. I didn't kidnap them.
entries.s_53686a92: Yes, I'm going to go rescue your family.
entries.s_4de6ecbe: Please, oh please. You've got to help me! I'm desperate!
entries.s_4b28f5f9: It doesn't sound like there's much that I can do.
entries.s_498b2572: Are you sure? I appreciate your selflessness, but it will probably be very dangerous. Though I agree that you are probably better equipped to go than I.
entries.s_46d3276e: Sorry, I don't think I can help right now.
entries.s_3abf0d9c: Thank you so very much. You have my sincerest gratitude. But do be careful, for my family's sake. Here, I'll transmit a location to your datapad. I think that the brutes that did this might be holed up in a cave there.
entries.s_31e2a586: I don't know for sure. There was a name scribbled at the bottom of the note that was left. It said, 'Sennex'. But I don't know what that means. I don't know anyone named Sennex.
entries.s_2fdb8fbd: On second thought, I don't think I can help right now.
entries.s_2f051629: I will go rescue your family for you.
entries.s_2e1d6626: Oops. Looks like I don't have that much money either.
entries.s_29e0b99d: Thanks. I think that I'll need it.
entries.s_27d7b600: Thank you! Oh, thank you so much. I will be in your debt always. I'm going to go make arrangements to pay the ransom money now. Thank you again for your kindness.
entries.s_22e3a3: Thanks again for paying the ransom! I'm going to go set the deal up right now!
entries.s_17089ea4: Yes, I will go save your wife and daughter.
entries.s_12d39d30: Who do you say might have taken your family, again?
entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (quest_hero_of_tatooine_farmer.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
